ui.panel.config.introduction: Siin saab seadistada oma komponente ja Home Assistant'i. Mitte kõike ei saa veel kasutajaliidese kaudu seadistada, kuid me töötame selle nimel.
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: Sul on salvestamata muudatusi. Oled kindel, et soovid lahkuda?
ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Alade register
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Alasid kasutatakse seadmete paiknemise korraldamiseks. Seda teavet kasutatakse läbivalt kasutajaliidese, lubade ja teiste süsteemidega sidumise korraldamisel.
Seadmete paigutamiseks alale mine alloleva lingi kaudu sidumiste lehele ja seejärel klõpsa seadme kaartideni jõudmiseks seadistatud sidumisel.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.no_: Paistab, et sul pole veel alasid!
ui.panel.config.area_registry.no_areas: Paistab, et sul pole veel alasid!
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Üldine
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Seadete muutmine võib olla väsitav tegevus. Me teame. See osa püüab su elu natuke hõlpsamaks teha.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Redaktor on keelatud, kuna seaded asuvad configuration.yaml failis.
ui.panel.config.core.section.server_cont: Mõned Home Assistant'i komponendid on taaslaetavad ilma taaskäivituseta. Taaslaadimise klõpsamisel tühistatakse nende praegused seaded ja laetakse uued.
Kontrolli oma Home Assistant serverit... Home Assistant'ist.
Kontrolli oma seadeid kui oled neis hiljuti muutusi teinud ja tahad veenduda, et kõik on korrektne
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Serveri juhtimine
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Taaskäivita ja peata Home Assistant server
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Kontrolli oma seadeid kui oled neis hiljuti muutusi teinud ja tahad veenduda, et kõik on korrektne
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Mõned Home Assistant'i komponendid on taaslaetavad ilma taaskäivituseta. Taaslaadimise klõpsamisel tühistatakse nende praegused seaded ja laetakse uued.
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Kontrolli oma Home Assistant serverit... Home Assistant'ist.
Oled kindel, et soovid taaskäivitada Home Assistant'i?
Oled kindel, et soovid seisata Home Assistant'i?
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Kohandamine
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Kohanda olemi atribuute. Lisatud või muudetud kohandused rakenduvad kohe. Eemaldatud kohandused rakenduvad olemi värskendamisel.
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.includ: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.not_ap: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_cus: The following attributes are already set in customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_out: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.different_incl: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_set: The following attributes of the entity are set programmatically.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_ove: You can override them if you like.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_not: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatiseerimine
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automaatika redaktor võimaldab teil luua ja muuta automatiseeringuid. Palun järgige allolevat linki, veendumaks, et oled Home Assistant'i õigesti seadistanud.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Me ei leidnud ühtegi muudetavat automatiseeringut
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Kasuta oma kodule elu sisse puhumiseks automatiseeringuid.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Ainult automations.yaml failis asuvad automatiseeringud on muudetavad.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Sul on salvestamata muudatusi. Oled kindel, et soovid lahkuda?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Päästikud on need, millest algab automatiseeringu töö. Ühe automatiseeringu jaoks on võimalik määrata mitu päästikut. Kui päästik vallandub, kontrollib Home Assistant võimalike tingimuste täidetust ja käivitab tegevuse.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Tingimused on automatiseeringu valikuline osa ja neid saab kasutada, et vältida tegevuse käivitumist päästiku vallandumisel. Tingimused tunduvad väga sarnased päästikutele, kuid on siiski erinevad. Päästik jälgib süsteemis toimuvaid sündmusi, tingimus jälgib ainult süsteem praegust olekut. Päästik võib märgata, et lülitit ollakse parasjagu lülitamas. Tingimus võib näha ainult seda, kas lüliti on praegu sisse või välja lülitatud.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: Tegevused on need, mida Home Assistant teeb kui päästik käivitab automatiseeringu.
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skript
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Use scripts to execute a sequence of actions.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Oled kindel, et soovid selle skripti kustutada?
ui.panel.config.script.editor.sequence_s: The sequence of actions of this script.
ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scenes
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.introductio: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.no_scenes: We couldn’t find any editable scenes
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Only scenes defined in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.delete_conf: Are you sure you want to delete this scene?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.introductio: Use scenes to bring your home alive.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.unsaved_con: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.name: Name
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all the devices to the state you want for this scene.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Entities that do not belong to a devices can be set here.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.de: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: Home Assistant pilv
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Juhi kodust eemal viibides, seo Alexa ja Google Assistant'iga.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Pilve sisselogimine
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Alusta tasuta prooviperioodi
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of Home Assistant away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the Home Assistant skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.title: Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.m: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.i: Kui sa ei soovi enam seda veebihaaki kasutada, võid
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.c: Oled kindel, et soovid selle veebihaagi keelata?
ui.panel.config.devices.caption: Seadmed
ui.panel.config.devices.details: Here are all the details of your device.
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Do you also want to rename the entity id's of your entities?
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Olemite register
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: Home Assistant peab registrit iga olemi kohta, mida ta kunagi näinud on ja mida saab üheselt tuvastada. Kõigile nendele olemitele antakse olemi ID, mis reserveeritakse ainult sellele olemile.

Kasuta olemite registrit olemi nime või ID muutmiseks või olemi eemaldamiseks Home Assistant'ist. Pane tähele, et olemi registrikirje eemaldamine ei eemalda olemit. Selleks järgi allolevat linki ja eemalda olem sidumiste lehelt.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.e: Keelatud olemeid ei lisata Home Assistant'i.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.c: Oled kindel, et soovid selle kirje kustutada?
Deleting an entry will not remove the entity from Home Assistant. To do this, you will need to remove the integration '{platform}' from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.n: Note: this might not work yet with all integrations.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Isikud
ui.panel.config.person.description: Halda isikuid, keda Home Assistant jälgib.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Paistab, et sa pole veel ühtegi isikut loonud.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete: Oled kindel, et soovid selle isiku kustutada?
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete2: Kõik sellele isikule kuuluvad seadmed jäävad peremehetuks.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Nimi
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Vali seadmed, mis kuuluvad sellele isikule.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: Sidumised
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: Not all integrations can be configured via the UI yet.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: See sidumine ei hõlma ühtegi seadet
Oled kindel, et soovid selle sidumise kustutada?
Selle sidumise lõplikuks eemaldamiseks taaskäivita Home Assistant
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: Not all required fields are filled in.

ui.panel.config.zha.caption: ZHA
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.head: Zigbee Home Automation - seadmete lisamine
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Leitud seadmed kuvatakse siin. Järgige seadme(te) juhiseid ja pange seade sidumisrežiimile.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Seadme haldus
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Select a device to view per-device options.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Atribuutide ja käskude vaatamiseks vali klaster.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.reconfigure: Taasseadista (tervenda) ZHA seade. Kasuta seda, kui seadmega on probleeme. Kui seade on akutoitega, siis veendu, et see oleks ärkvel ja oleks valmis käske vastu võtma.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.updateDevic: Anna sellele seadmele seadmete registris kohandatud nimi.
ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Käivita käske, mis mõjutavad Z-Wave võrku. Sa ei saa tagasisidet selle kohta, kas enamik käske õnnestus, kuid selle kontrollimiseks võid uurida OZW-logi.
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: Sõltuvalt võrgu suurusest võib see natuke aega võtta.
Ärkvel sõlmedele on päringud tehtud. Uinuvatele sõlmedele tehakse päringud, kui nad ärkavad.
